full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Automatic Data Processing Equipment - Department of National Defence
## Solicitation Number: BPM017345/20722
## Publication Date: November 9, 2022
## Closing Date: November 22, 2022, 14:00:00 Eastern Time

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for automatic data processing equipment under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contract Details

* Contract Category: General Government (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Solicitation Description

The Department of National Defence requires Startech 4 Port PCI & Network Adapters or Equivalent. The solicitation includes the following requirements:

* Delivery to Ashton, Ontario
* 90 federal government working days from contract award
* No security requirements
* No comprehensive land claim agreements

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Contact Information

For all enquiries related to this solicitation, please contact:
Tara Halajko, Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor
Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2N1

Phone: 343-999-5042
Email: [tara.halajko@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.halajko@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

## Document Links

Please access the solicitation and submit bids through the following link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Note:** This tender is expired and no longer accepting submissions. contractors should have reviewed and submitted before it was too late. 
 

### Related Documents:
List of deliverables, statement of requirement, and other documentation are available at the specified links. Please review the documentation before submitting a proposal.
